errors.title: No token
errors.details: No access token provided in header

errors.title: Unauthorized User
errors.details: Only users with admin credentials can use this route

errors.title: Invalid Credetials
errors.details: Invalid password or user Id

errors.title: Invalid User
errors.details: User not registered in the system

errors.title: booking error
errors.details: Equipment is already booked

errors.title: Barcode error
errors.details: Invalid barcode

errors.title: Barcode Registration error
errors.details: That barcode alreay exists

errors.title: Booking id error
errors.details: Booking id dosen't exists

errors.title: Checkout Error
errors.details: Can't check out equipment that isn't approved or returned

errors.title: Return Error
errors.details: Can't return something that is returned or not checked out

errors.title: Booking User Id error
errors.details: User with that id has not made that booking

errors.title: Can't approve booking
errors.details: Can't approve a booking that is either already approved, checked out or returned

errors.title: Can't deny booking
errors.details: Can't deny a booking that is already approved, checked out or returned

errors.title: User Id error
errors.details: Account with that user Id already registered

errors.title: Email error
errors.details: User with that email already registered

errors.title: Account error
errors.details: Account has not been approved by admin

errors.title: No user id error
errors.details: No user with that id is registered

errors.title: User status error
errors.details: Can't deny or approve an account for a user that i already approved

errors.title: Invalid form data
errors.details: Invalid form data, see documentaion for correct values

errors.title: Account removed error
errors.details: This account has been removed from active accounts, if you belive this was a misstake. Contact admin for restoration of the account
